item.title: NAS 與 ESXi
item.description: 這邊因要將備份的虛擬機放至 NAS，NAS 必須使用掛載方式。 掛載、卸載 NAS 掛載 [root@localhost:/opt/ghettovcb/bin] esxcfg-nas -a -o 192.168.7.11 -s /volume1/ASUS-Server [NAME] Connecting to NAS volume: [NAME] Belstar_KH created and connected. # -a|--add Add a new NAS filesystem to /vmfs volumes. Requires --host and --share options. Use --readonly option only for readonly access. # -o|--host <host> Set the host name or ip address for a NAS mount. For version 4.1, can be a comma-separated list. # -s|--share <share> Set the name of the NAS share on the remote system.
